WITH P AS ( SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(PATH_BASE,'\','/') AS FULL_PATH FROM TB_DRAWING_DOC WHERE 1 = 1
AND DOC_ST = 'A'
AND PATH_BASE IS NOT NULL
AND CREATED_AT BETWEEN to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtFrom},'-','')) AND to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtTo},'-',''))+1
AND SALES_CD LIKE '%'||#{salesCd}||'%'
), N AS ( -- 최대 폴더 깊이 만큼 조정 SELECT LEVEL AS LV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 50 ) SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN N.LV = 1 THEN '#' ELSE SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV-1) - 1) END AS PARENT, SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1) AS ID, CASE WHEN N.LV = 1 THEN SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, 1) - 1) ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1), '[^/]+$') END AS TEXT, NULL AS DOC_ID, NULL AS DOC_NO, NULL AS FILE_NAME, SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1) AS PATH_BASE, 0 AS IS_LEAF, 'unit' AS TYPE, 'Y' AS CODE_ETC FROM P JOIN N ON INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) > 0 ORDER BY ID

WITH VER AS ( SELECT VER_ID , DOC_ID , VER_NO , STORED_PATH , FILE_SIZE , CREATED_AT , CREATED_BY , INSTR(STORED_PATH, '\', -1) AS LAST_BS , COMMENT_TXT FROM TB_DRAWING_VERSION WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId} ) SELECT VER_ID , DOC_ID , VER_NO , STORED_PATH , FILE_SIZE , TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WORK_DTTM , CREATED_BY AS WORK_NM , CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(STORED_PATH, -4)) = '.DWG' AND LAST_BS > 0 THEN SUBSTR(STORED_PATH, LAST_BS + 1) --파일명 ELSE NULL END AS FILE_NAME , CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(STORED_PATH, -4)) = '.DWG' AND LAST_BS > 0 THEN SUBSTR(STORED_PATH, 1, LAST_BS - 1) --경로 ELSE STORED_PATH END AS DIR_PATH , COMMENT_TXT --상세이력 FROM VER ORDER BY VER_NO

WITH BASE AS ( SELECT DISTINCT T.SALES_CD, T.PART_NO, T.UNIT_NO FROM TB_DRAWING_DOC T WHERE 1=1
AND T.DOC_ST = 'A'
AND T.PATH_BASE IS NOT NULL
AND T.CREATED_AT BETWEEN TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{reqDtFrom},'-','')) AND TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{reqDtTo}, '-','')) + 1
AND T.SALES_CD = #{salesCd} ), L1 AS ( SELECT DISTINCT '#' AS PARENT , B.SALES_CD AS ID , B.SALES_CD AS TEXT , 'sales' AS TYPE , B.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD , NULL AS PART_NO , NULL AS UNIT_NO FROM BASE B ), L2 AS ( SELECT DISTINCT B.SALES_CD AS PARENT , B.SALES_CD || '/' || B.PART_NO AS ID , B.PART_NO AS TEXT , 'part' AS TYPE , B.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD , B.PART_NO AS PART_NO , NULL AS UNIT_NO FROM BASE B WHERE B.PART_NO IS NOT NULL ), L3 AS ( SELECT DISTINCT B.SALES_CD || '/' || B.PART_NO AS PARENT , B.SALES_CD || '/' || B.PART_NO || '/' || B.UNIT_NO AS ID , B.UNIT_NO AS TEXT , 'unit' AS TYPE , B.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD , B.PART_NO AS PART_NO , B.UNIT_NO AS UNIT_NO FROM BASE B WHERE B.PART_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.UNIT_NO IS NOT NULL ) SELECT X.PARENT, X.ID, X.TEXT , NULL AS DOC_ID, NULL AS DOC_NO, NULL AS FILE_NAME , X.ID AS PATH_BASE , 0 AS IS_LEAF , X.TYPE , 'Y' AS CODE_ETC , X.SALES_CD, X.PART_NO, X.UNIT_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM L1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM L2 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM L3) X ORDER BY X.ID

/* SALES_CD / PART_NO / UNIT_NO 기준 파일 리스트 (페이징) */ WITH BASE AS ( SELECT T.DOC_ID AS DOC_ID , T.DOC_NO AS DOC_NO , SUBSTR(T.FILE_NAME, INSTR(T.FILE_NAME, '\', -1) + 1) AS FILE_NAME , T.EXT AS FILE_TYPE , REPLACE(T.PATH_BASE,'\','/') AS LPATH , TO_CHAR(T.CREATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WORK_DTTM , T.CREATED_BY AS WORK_NM , T.ACTIVE_VER AS VER_NO , T.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD , T.DOC_ST AS DOC_ST , A.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE , A.VER_NO AS VER_NO -- (주의) 컬럼명 중복 시 마지막 값이 매핑됨 FROM TB_DRAWING_DOC T LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DRAWING_VERSION A ON T.DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID AND T.ACTIVE_VER = A.VER_NO WHERE 1=1
AND T.DOC_ST = 'A'
AND T.CREATED_AT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{reqDtFrom}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{reqDtTo}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T.SALES_CD = #{salesCd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND T.PART_NO = #{partNo ,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND T.UNIT_NO = #{unitNo ,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.FILE_NAME) AS RN FROM BASE B ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex} ORDER BY FILE_NAME
